name: workspace
author: Prosopo

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build
scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "package-lock.json" -type f -delete
scripts.build: if test "$W"; then npm run build -w @prosopo/$W; else npm run build:procaptcha-react; fi
scripts.build:contract: npm run build:i18n && npm -w @prosopo/contract run build
scripts.build:datasets: npm run build:contract && npm -w @prosopo/datasets run build
scripts.build:provider: npm run build:procaptcha && npm -w @prosopo/provider run build
scripts.build:procaptcha: npm run build:api && npm run build:datasets && npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha run build
scripts.build:procaptcha-react: npm run build:procaptcha && npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha-react run build
scripts.test: npm run remove-test-container && docker compose --file docker-compose.test.yml up -d substrate-test-node && npm -w @prosopo/provider run test
scripts.git:pull: npm run git:fetch && git submodule foreach -q --recursive git pull

description: Integrates protocol and provider for development purposes
